conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true 3D cutaway/isometric render with wall height, thickness, and visible interior volume.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Auto-rejected due to major layout/room omissions relative to the 2D plan (see errors).

detected_errors.description: More than 50% of the rooms/spaces from the 2D plan are missing or replaced: playroom, foyer/closets, pantry, and WC/closet zone are not represented; a bedroom appears in the 3D render though no bedroom exists in the 2D plan.
Overall layout configuration and adjacency relationships do not match the 2D plan (room shapes, partition locations, and circulation differ substantially).

summary: Although the second image is a true 3D cutaway, it is not a faithful 2D-to-3D conversion because the majority of planned rooms and the core layout are missing or altered.
